control_attributes.Control: SI-4 (4) INBOUND AND OUTBOUND COMMUNICATIONS TRAFFIC
control_attributes.control_description: The information system monitors inbound and outbound communications traffic [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] for unusual or unauthorized activities or conditions.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization tests intrusion-monitoring tools [Assignment: organization-defined frequency].
